{"name": "North Carolina SNAP Application", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit" https://hungerfreenj.org/summer-ebt-2024/
North Carolina Food and Nutrition Services (formerly Food Stamps) are available for all households with limited income and resources.
There are three ways to apply for Food and Nutrition Services (Food Stamps):
*Apply Online with ePASS: https://epass.nc.gov/
*Apply in Person at your county Department of Social Services (DSS) office: https://www.ncdhhs.gov/localDSS
*By Mail or Turn in at Local DSS Office - Fill out a paper application form and mail to or drop it off at your local county DSS office.
Learn more at https://www.ncdhhs.gov/divisions/child-and-family-well-being/food-and-nutrition-services-food-stamps
Need Interpreter Services? Call 866-719-0141", "email": "", "url": "https://epass.nc.gov/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(866) 719-0141", "type": "voice"}]}
